item.description: The repairable, long-lasting smartphone is back, better than ever.

item.title: BMW’s next EV is its most sustainable car yet—here’s why
item.description: The break-even point with an ICE vehicle is as little as one year.

item.title: Is Roman concrete more sustainable? It’s complicated.
item.description: Roman concrete produces as much, if not more, CO2 as modern concrete, fewer air pollutants.

item.title: Making Roman concrete produces as much CO2 as modern concrete
item.description: Roman concrete produces as much, if not more, CO2 as modern concrete, fewer air pollutants.

item.title: Why Benedict Cumberbatch Is Calling Out Hollywood for Being a “Grossly Wasteful Industry”
item.description: The actor used his body transformation for his role as Marvel’s Doctor Strange as an example, saying that “eating beyond your appetite” was wasteful and “horrific.”
